storyInfo: The dream is over, but no one has yet reached the ends of their respective paths. An anticipated moment approaches.

attributes.content: Dorothy... Dorothy! Are you okay?!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Yes, I'm fine.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: S-Slow down. You almost knocked me over...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: It's all my fault. If I'd found out what Ferdinand's been up to sooner... If I'd figured out a way to tell everyone sooner... If I'd talked to you a little more... If...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sheesh, look at you... You came all the way here from observation in a hurry. There's dirt on your face.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: It might've gotten on my face when I was beating up Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I already forgot what I grabbed to beat him with... My hand was shaking really bad.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Were you taking it out on him?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: No... That didn't feel good at all.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Dorothy, I'm disappointed, and I'm angry, but after the dust settled, and after seeing those soldiers run after him... I also started to feel really bad.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Because of everything Ferdinand did?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: No, because... because of what he could've done.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I still remember everything he taught me, and I still believe that, when he told me about his grand ideas, there wasn't an inkling of deception behind the light in his eyes.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: And... there was a time... when I wanted his recognition more than anything...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: That's gotta be really silly, right? Saying stuff like that?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Not even a little, Elena.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Sometimes... It's harder to accept than to deny.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You won't have to be anyone's assistant ever again.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: He won't cast his shadow on you again, but the flames he lit still burn in your eyes. His end is your start point, and there's no doubt you will walk much farther than he ever did.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dorothy...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Why do you sound like you're saying goodbye? What do you mean I won't be an assistant anymore...? I know you plugged yourself into the 'Hub,' but that doesn't mean there's something wrong with your body, right?!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Calm down...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm fine. If you don't believe me, ask our good doctor...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I make no guarantees.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Olivia, are you finished checking all the Pioneers?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: There's still one more to go.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The 'Transmitter' is still flowing through you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You are showing no physical abnormalities at the moment, but no one can tell how things might develop in the future.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You don't need to worry about me, my dear doctor.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: These substances flowing inside me pose no greater threat than the crystals on your bodies... and the brewing storm up ahead.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But those little things won't stop us, will they?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Certainly not.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The out-of-control construct caused significant destruction to the base.
There is hardly any rubble in front of them; only a clean floor of silvery white.
Before long, even that will be cleaned up.
But... there will always be traces left here.
Suddenly, the silver river in front of begins to move again.
The reflection of the rainclouds, huh...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Acknowledged.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The government has taken over all administration of the site, and per our agreement, Rhodes Island needs to destroy all the information we've collected.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: But this isn't the end.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I just got a new lead about Ferdinand's backer. I'm on my way to meet with the informant now.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Saria stops in her tracks and looks up.
There are rainclouds slowly drifting their way into the city.
At the test site some sixty miles away...
Somebody else is thinking the exact same thing.
It's about to rain in Trimounts.
attributes.name: Silence & Saria

attributes.content: That's pretty much a wrap.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Thanks for helping us clean up, Greyy.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I'm glad I could help, Mr. Sonny.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: And uh... there's not actually much to clean.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: We did good. Looks just like how things were when we got here.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Hey, do me a favor and pass on our apology and some thanks to your coworkers. It's just like you said. You Rhodes Islanders pulled us up out of our funk.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: No, Mr. Sonny. It was you and the rest of the Pioneers who saved yourselves.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Did you forget? If you hadn't made your 'voice' heard, we wouldn't have had the chance to take your hand.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I'm blessed to have a friend like you.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: My little engineer buddy, I'll never forget what you told me, not to mention everything that happened here at the site.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: And Mary...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: It's my job to make sure all of you get away from the site.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: What I was gonna say is... you still got a chance to arrest me.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: This whole mess is an experiment gone wrong, thanks to the work of a lone actor—That's the word from on high anyway.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: And since those Rhine researchers don't want to press charges, your little 'kidnapping' isn't in the records.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: No, I'm not talking about the last couple days.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I'm talking about... four years ago.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Do you know why I signed up for the experiment that night?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Every Pioneer has a reason to wanna go back to the city, and my reason is...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I have to go back to someone I hurt bad—Someone who used to be my dearest friend.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I owe her an apology, and—
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I deserve to be judged.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I've been on the run for four years. At first, I thought the wastes swallowed my dreams, and changed me into a different man...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: But that's not what happened.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: On that night four years ago, I killed the Sonny Romano who believed in justice and equality. I did it with my own two hands.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: If you do get arrested, there's only two possible punishments waiting for you.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: One, you'll get thrown in prison and then the Infected quarantine zone once you've done your time.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: And the other...
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You be a Pioneer, and the nomadic cities will be closed to you forever.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: But you're already a Pioneer.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: So that means you...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Let's stop it with all this talk about whether I forgive you or not. Your old buddy is here to send you on your way. Shouldn't you hurry up and do something more meaningful?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: A long overdue, warm hug.
A true reunion, and also a formal farewell after years apart.
Have you figured out where to go next?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: It's some guy who's got a bunch of letters for a name. Starts with a D. He sent us all a kinda weird email the other day, and there was an invitation to work with him attached.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I still have no idea how he got the contact information for the Pioneer Team... He doesn't seem like he's from a recruiting agency.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You should be more careful the next time you pick up work...
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Try not to break the law again either. Otherwise, it doesn't matter where you run. I'll drag you back here. I promise.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You got it, Officer.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Not far away, his brothers and sisters on the Pioneer Team call out to him.
Sonny knows that, this time, he's truly prepared to go on his journey.
They started cleaning up the mess at the test site.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: It was your Energy Director who made the mess anyway...;Rhine Lab's still in charge of cleanup.

attributes.content: Yeah... I guess this is a kinda corporate social responsibility for us, huh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I'm more willing to believe this is a deal.;......;On the essence of what you just said, I agree.

attributes.content: Alright, not like there's anyone who believes that explanation here.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Those Pioneers...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: You've been watching them for a while.

attributes.content: They're starting a new journey.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I wonder... what they'll find next time?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Again and again in a never-ending cycle.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: They can never go back home, and they might never again have a place they can even call home.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Doctor, I found that the Rhine personnel are digging away in the rubble of the labs...
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Director Muelsyse, you're here too.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.options: Have you figured out when you'll answer my question yet?

attributes.content: Question... What is it that's bothering me?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: When I'm prepared to talk...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You'll be the first to know, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Relax... It's all been taken care of. No civilians will ever find out what happened at Site 359, and there is no chance of anyone using this against you in your upcoming election.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Yes, I'm well out of Trimounts already, on my way to Max D.C. now.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Ferdinand...?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: He's no threat anymore. You can be sure of that.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Ma'am... Y-You're standing right outside Rhine Lab. Why did you lie to the vice president?
attributes.name: Columbian Mercenary

attributes.content: Because...
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I still remember my original goal.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: He doesn't know how far he's walked.
His aching, hoarse throat reminds him that his body cannot bear such exhaustion.
However... It feels as though Trimounts is right behind him.
It could be right in front of him too.
The shadow of a nomadic city is enormous, and it grows endlessly with the passage of time.
He must hurry... hurry...
Where is he going in such a hurry? Will someone betray him at the next waypoint, just as Elena and Ho'olheyak did?
Hold it there.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: We know who you are.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Ferdinand... You think you get to just walk away scot-free after everything you've done?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Don't think that gear you're in is going to scare us. You talk big, but you can't actually control it.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Even if you open fire and kill us all here...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: You'll run into the next team of Pioneers.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Look out into the wastes! No friends here! Your enemies go on forever!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: It doesn't matter.

The 'Transmitter' he developed himself is right at his fingertips. All he has to do is inject it into himself, and he will immediately be able to wield this power armor with ease, and all these so-called enemies will be powerless against him.
But why doesn't he do it?
Is it because he doesn't have the courage that Dorothy does?
Or is it because...
Ferdinand, you are the one who's being left behind by the times—the grand ideals in your eyes.
Because you never believed that you belong to this epoch.
You always talk about how you're in control of it, you're always thinking, controlling... but you never feel.
Whose voice is this? Is it... Elena's?
Right, if you don't want to be left behind... you must become a part of it.
The power armor remains silent. It proceeds no further, and it does not put up a struggle.
It simply raises its arms...
Just like it is embracing the winds, the sunlight, and the lands before it.
An onslaught of angry Pioneers rushes toward it, and just as the silver monster that once hovered midair above the test site—swallows the iron-forged body whole.
Does the Maylander Foundation still have doubts about this?
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: No, Control.
I'm not representing Maylander this time.
I'm a busy woman, you know...
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Right. It so happens I prefer to skip the pleasantries.
You retrieved the most crucial part of the experiment at Site 359.
The 'Hub' was destroyed in its entirety, by Dorothy—That's what it says in the report submitted to the government.
But it so happens that I saw a team in some pretty low-key outfits driving a discreet, completely curtained off transport into your personal laboratory.
Saria said you turned a blind eye to what Ferdinand was doing... Perhaps it would be more accurate to say you used him.
The thing that you wanted most is now sitting right on your desk.
The cleanup work at Site 359 is a project that Rhine Lab had to take.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: And every day, countless failed experiments' byproducts are destroyed.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: No matter what it is you think you saw, it's not worthy of outside attention.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Destroyed? Well, of course. I'm sure that scrap heap is gone from your desk.
Evidence can be destroyed, and memories can be modified, but whenever something happens, it tends to have a lasting effect on the things that come after.
Loken, Parvis, Ferdinand... Maybe, at some point in the future, their names will be completely absent from the history books.
But there is no doubt they changed the course of history.
Arts Unit implants, technologies imbued with revived ancient Sarkaz powers, power armor controllable over a long distance, and mental manifestation networks over even broader areas...
What will be the next experiment that alters the very epoch we live in?
A researcher is here to explore all the possibilities out there.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: I don't make predictions.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Suppose that memories can leap past the limitations of time. Predictions are nothing more than rediscovering history that's been buried.
Why don't we reacquaint ourselves, Kristen Wright?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I'm Ho'olheyak, historian and Honorary President of the Columbian Astrological Research Association.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: And forgive me for making a prediction right here and now—
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Perhaps... I will be the partner you will most need, and very soon.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Miss Astesia, Researcher Elena isn't back yet.
attributes.name: Rhine Researcher

attributes.content: I know... She's told me already.
attributes.name: Astesia

attributes.content: I just want to stay here a little while. So I can see her when she comes back.
attributes.name: Astesia

attributes.content: Haha... Sometimes, I'm jealous of Elena, having a sister that cares so much about her.
attributes.name: Rhine Researcher

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Astesia

attributes.content: Who was that...?
attributes.name: Astesia

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Astesia

attributes.content: The astrolabe... lit up?
attributes.name: Astesia

attributes.content: The sky after rain is always exceptionally clear.
This is one of the rare reasons that Kristen ever steps out of her laboratory.
It isn't that she particularly likes the twinkling lights. If conjectures cannot be proven, then they are only self-deceiving lies.
Yet lies aren't completely meaningless. Even if a shadow has been twisted thousands of times, it is still cast by something that is real and truthful.
Lies exist only to demonstrate one thing—that the truth also exists.
It is hidden among these radiant, twinkling stars, and the sky also isn't as far as it seems.
When she reaches her hand out, she will surely be able to touch it—
The only truth that has been suffocating the people from up above for thousands of years.
